Title: Forge Ahead!
Description:
The forge lies ahead of you, and with it the heart of the mogu's weaponsmithing ability.

And beyond that, the mogu gatekeeper, who holds the key to unlocking the gate to the next part of the city.

It's time to move out!
ObjectivesText: Kill the Master of the Forge and collect a Codex Fragment from Fleshcrafter Hoku in the Isle of Thunder.
RewardText: Good work. What you did today brings us one step closer to our ultimate goal.
